titles: An Act impowering judges for probate of vvills, and granting administrations
author: England and Wales.
publisher: printed by John Field, printer to the Parliament. And are to be sold at the seven Stars in Fleetstreet, over against Dunstans Church,
notes: Dated at end: Ordered by the Parliament, that this Act be forthwith printed and published. Passed the 19th of May 1659. Tho. St Nicholas clerk of the Parliament.
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library.
